# thunder_fw_gtp (Resource)

`thunder_fw_gtp`: Configure GTP

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_fw_gtp" "thunder_fw_gtp" {
  sampling_enable {
    counters1 = "all"
  }
  gtp_value = "enable"
}
```
